item.title: nginx获取客户端真实ip，x-real-ip和x-forwarded-for注意
item.description: 本文参考于: http://serverfault.com/questions/314574/nginx-real-ip-header-and-x-forwarded-for-seems-wrong/414166 http://luyadong.blog.51cto.com/2876653/851964 http://nginx.org/en/docs/http/ngx_http_realip_module.html http://distinctplace.com/infrastructure/2014/04/23/story-behind-x-forwarded-for-and-x-real-ip-headers/ X-Real-IP和X-Forwarded-For的注意 在配置nginx反向代理时，我们往往做如下配置 location /uri { proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
